alert.note: Alert for Grafton (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 01 at 11:40AM EDT until May 01 at 7:09PM EDT by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...Observed flooding changed to Minor severity and increased in duration for the following rivers in New Hampshire... Pemigewasset River At Woodstock affecting Grafton County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Pemigewasset River at Woodstock. * WHEN...Until this evening. * IMPACTS...At 9.0 feet, Minor lowland flooding begins. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:30 AM EDT Monday the stage was 9.5 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 10:30 AM EDT Monday was 10.0 feet. - Forecast...The river will oscillate around flood stage with a maximum value of 8.7 feet tomorrow evening. - Flood stage is 9.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/gray.
